title: QUESTION THAT IS REALLY IMPORTANT AND NEEDS ANSWERING!!!!
body:
I'm just wondering how much my account is worth exactly. I'll tell you about my acc.
IGN: OMGItsMyDestiny
I made this account back in season 1 
It doesn't have 1000 normal wins yet but its close (around 900)But overall its had 478 ranked wins in its lifetime, half of them are this season.
I'm silver 5 peaked at silver 4 so obvs im not a god tier player but whatever
I've counted the skins and its comes to around 100 most being legacy including Judgement Kayle,Zombie Brand and 3 out of 4 championship skins, no Riven ;'(.
2 Paid icons 2015 C9 Worlds icon and the battlecast icon
112 champs
Here's a list of all my skins:
Bear with me because some of these i bought years ago so i have no idea if they are legacy or not so feel free to correct me

Mecha Aatrox

replies.body: You can't sell your account if this is what you need the value for.
950 If it's like 10$ per skin - for skins.
Well you have a fiora skin so the value for me dropped by like a hundred thousand dollars.
